title: Кое-что   новенькое
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2D8yBXH

by Scofie

Её новый бойфренд жаждет заняться с ней оральным сексом, но Рей без конца ему отказывает, потому что никогда прежде кайфа от этого она не получала. Но, возможно, ей просто не хватало того самого мужчины, который сделал бы всё правильно?

summary:
Yes, they are bad boys, but they are always getting a painful and sad past. 
Can someone explain why the bad boys who are so...
body:
Yes, they are bad boys, but they are always getting a painful and sad past.

Can someone explain why the bad boys who are so attractive always have long dark hair?

summary: So, a little off track here...
title: So, a little off track here...
body:
So obviously I wasn’t a shell of a person before BoRhap and Queen took over my life, so like everyone else, I have a little side thing. I write fanfictions. 

Now, they are NOT Queen or BoRhap fanfics but rather Reylo (Star Wars) fanfics and if anyone here is interested in reading them, I’ve given the link below… So if you read it, please drop by and tell me what you thought, I would love to know your thoughts.


https://my.w.tt/yGz6rORBrT

blog.name: mandowords
blog.title: Miit'alor
blog.description: I am a descriptivist linguist for the Mando'a language. I show what it can do, not what it MUST do. This is a place for discussion about Mando'a, and Mandalorian society and culture. Feel free to use the head cannons from this blog (or reblogged from others) in your RP or writing. All words and descriptions are taken from the mandoa.org Mandalorian Dictionary. Want to support this blog? Buy me a Kofi? OR buy some Mando'a themed items? Visit our Discord? Blog icon by Rina

blog.name: anotherbondiblonde
blog.title: AnotherBondiBlonde
blog.description:
**DO NOT SEND PORN OR DICK PICS. I WILL AUTOMATICALLY BLOCK YOU.** 'Another Bondi Blonde?!! Just what bloody Bondi needs like a hole in the head' are the poetic words barked at me by my boss the day I turned up with newly bleached locks. I'm a travelling seanchaidh of sorts. A ping pong OzScot currently living on the Dark Side. Mummy, Tantrum & Meltdown Negotiator & Playdate Social Secretary to my Irish Twins who are my absolute world, Staffie owner, Wifey, TKD, Nerd, HR professional, charity warrior, Governess of Home Duties, Keeper of the Snacks, spoonie, music lover, avid reader, shoe collector, current redhead but blonde at heart, clothes slave and booze hag to Scottish botanical gins/unofficial taster. This is an eclectic collection of thoughts, lyrics and images that tickle my fancy. I do not have copyright to most things I post so please ask me to remove if needs be. I will still be here after 17.12.18. No dick pics or unsolicited sleazy messages as I'm not here to hook up. Occasional #me posts. My bark is probably just as bad as my bite. Some NSFW postings so bugger off if you are under 18 🔞 PS I don't send nudes or sext so jog on. I won’t follow back porn blogs etc. If you send me a dick pic or an abusive message I will publish it, name and shame then bake cookies and shit. PPS Do NOT use my personal photos to advertise local singles.

https://www.instagram.com/anotherbondiblonde/ or

anotherbondiblonde@mail.com

blog.name: ao3feed-starwars
blog.title: Star Wars AO3 Feed
blog.description:
An AO3 Feed for the Star Wars - All Media Types tag.

Icon from the Star Wars App.

title: Sin rastros
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2AF7a5N

by ArianaGomez94

Anakin Skywalker se ha ido de la Orden Jedi, conmocionando a sus allegados. Sin embargo su padawan, Ahsoka Tano, teme que su partida, sea el disfraz de una desaparición orquestada por el enemigo. Con la ayuda de una cazarrecompensas, emprende un viaje hacia el planeta natal, donde allí conocerá en profundidad el mundo del contrabando y un secreto bien guardado de su maestro.

Words: 3035, Chapters: 2/?, Language: Español

  • Fandoms: Star Wars: The Clone Wars (2008) - All Media Types
  • Rating: General Audiences
  • Warnings: Graphic Depictions Of Violence
  • Categories: Gen
  • Characters: Anakin Skywalker, Ahsoka Tano, Obi-Wan Kenobi
  • Additional Tags: Clone Wars, Star Wars References, Clones, Original Character(s)


read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2AF7a5N

blog.name: ao3feed--reylo
blog.title: Reylo AO3 Feed
blog.description:
This blog automatically posts links to AO3 fics containing the Rey/Kylo Ren tag.
Avatar by @panda-capuccino

title: L'appel de la Lumière
body:
read it on the AO3 at http://bit.ly/2Fv9ks6

by Moongrim

Post TLJ - Rey fait désormais partie de la Résistance. Kylo Ren est à la tête du Premier Ordre. Leurs chemins vont-ils à nouveau se croiser? La Force va-t-elle encore une fois pouvoir réunir ces deux êtres que tout oppose?

Words: 3945, Chapters: 1/?, Language: Français

  • Fandoms: Star Wars Prequel Trilogy
  • Rating: Mature
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Characters: Rey, Kylo Ren, Leia Organa, Poe Dameron, Luke Skywalker, Maz Kanata, Armitage Hux
  • Relationships: Kylo Ren/Rey, Finn/Rose Tico
  • Additional Tags: Post TLJ, j'aime pas le stags, ça spoile l'histoire
